scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:terraform
scripts.deploy:terraform: terraform -chdir=. init && terraform -chdir=. plan -var-file=staging.tfvars && terraform -chdir=. apply -var-file=staging.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && terraform -chdir=. init && terraform -chdir=. plan -var-file=staging.tfvars && terraform -chdir=. apply -var-file=staging.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && terraform -chdir=. plan -var-file=production.tfvars && terraform -chdir=. apply -var-file=production.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.upload:static: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$(terraform -chdir=. output -raw s3_bucket_name) --delete
